mapper.select: SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY A.SRT_NO) AS RNO , A.QUIZ_MSTR_INFO_SEQ , A.QUIZ_MSTR_DTL_SEQ , B.QUIZ_USER_ANS_SEQ , B.QUIZ_USER_ANS_DTL_SEQ , A.SRT_NO , A.CONTENT , B.ERASE_YN FROM QUIZ_MSTR_DTL A LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM QUIZ_USER_ANS_DTL WHERE QUIZ_USER_ANS_SEQ = #{quizUserAnsSeq}) B ON A.QUIZ_MSTR_DTL_SEQ = B.QUIZ_MSTR_DTL_SEQ WHERE A.QUIZ_MSTR_INFO_SEQ = #{quizMstrInfoSeq}
